title: EZ walk downtown. Remod bath/kit, d/w. All wood flrs. Carport/big stor
posting_body: Please text or call Susan at
In historic Old Mountain View, an easy walk to downtown.
This is a spacious remodeled upstairs apartment with nobody underneath it.
-  Recently installed Pergo flooring everywhere except for tile floors in the kitchen and bathroom
-The bathroom was recently remodeled with a new tub, tile, etc.
-The large remodeled, eat-in kitchen has recently installed cabinets, a solid countertop and a dishwasher.
-The bedrooms have mirrored closet doors and ceiling fans
-Comes with a carport and a separate full-sized storage closet
The rent includes water and garbage.
We do not take the last month's rent upon move-in.
Non-smokers only, please, and renter's insurance is required.
We welcome one or two neutered cats.
We will accept one small to medium-sized ADULT neutered dog of most non-aggressive, non-baying breeds for an additional $50 per month.
